mercy, I suppose you could e-mail files to the group but they would not be=
stored in the files section, they would arrive as a message post. Go to the=
 files section, create a folder and post your files to that folder.there is=
 a feature there that allows an announcement to the group when a file has b=
een posted. I am attaching some info on the radio shack boxes and what the =
difference is and which I recommend.If you would like to get started doing =
box research just let me know and I will help you on your way. bruce
Bruce =
Halliday 


To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: taylormercy@...: T=
hu, 27 Mar 2008 17:44:34 -0400Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] New to group





Bruc=
e,
 
Thanks for the warm welcome.  I have only read a little on Franks box,=
 and became interested.  I have read through the old newsletter I think the=
y were called spirit voices, awhile back.  I was given all the newsletters =
that came out at the time.  A few years back, when I did went through them,=
 there were a lot of information and schematics on researchers during the 6=
0-80=92s doing the same research with real time as what everyone here is re=
searching.  
 
I look forward to reading more and listening to the files pe=
ople post.  I do have one question I hope you can answer; I=92m not sure ho=
w this group sends evp files to each other.  Do they attach them to the ema=
il or upload them to the yahoo group.  Any advice would be appreciated.
 
M=
ercy
 
 
 
-----Original Message-----From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:=
EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com]On Behalf Of bruce hallidaySent: Thursday, March 27=
, 2008 4:17 PMTo: evp-itc@yahoogroups.comSubject: RE: [EVP-ITC] New to grou=
p
 Mercy, welcome to our group, my name is Bruce.this group is dedicated to=
 EVP and ITC research in all forms, but you will find mostly box researcher=
s here.we are a rare breed in the EVP field. We use what most people refer =
to as Frank's box, although there are several alternative similar boxes tha=
t are widely used by mostresearchers here.Box communication differs from Tr=
aditional EVP in the way that doing research and what we call sessions with=
 a box allows the user to have two way live, real time communication with t=
he spirit world. the details of the research are much to complicated to go =
into in a welcome post, but If you are interested in getting involved in bo=
x research or have any questions. Please feel free to contact me or post yo=
ur questions here. there are many knowledgeable researchers here that can h=
elp. the method of EVP you mention With EVP maker was only introduced here =
a couple of days ago and I myself and a few other researchers have barely h=
ad time to experiment with it.I did however post a number of files from thi=
s method in my folder 'Bruce's box files' located in the files section. If =
you have any questions or need help getting started you can e-mail me paran=
ormalinvestigating@...'ll be more than happy to help. Bruce
Bruce =
Halliday 
 



To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: taylormercy@...=
: Thu, 27 Mar 2008 15:23:05 -0400Subject: [EVP-ITC] New to group



Hello E=
veryone,
 
I just joined this group, and started ready through the messages=
 last night.  I am not new to EVP research; I have been doing this research=
 and keeping records for the past 5 years.  I am excited about the method y=
ou are all trying now using EVP Maker and the wav file on the alphabet.  I =
would also like to try this, in the past I have used a white noise generato=
r, fan, water, light harp music, and even tried using the parabolic microph=
one to amplify the spirits voice coming through on the computer.  
 
I look=
 forward to sharing any ideas with the group, and hopefully someone can dir=
ect me more on the research you are all trying.  Would like to contribute t=
o the group in any way I can.  Now off to listen to some of the evps captur=
ed through this method=85J
 
Mercy

 



Test your Star IQ Play now! 
 



=



_________________________________________________________________
Watch =
=93Cause Effect,=94 a show about real people making a real difference.  Lea=
rn more.
http://im.live.com/Messenger/IM/MTV/?source=3Dtext_watchcause
